title: [Grand Dais, Altar of Crowns]
description: Illuminated by a circular shaft of sunlight blazing through a skylight above, the high altar is a tapered block of golvern draped by snow-pure silk.  Interlocking circles and arcs of gold inlay cleave the marble floor, spreading from the altar like ripples across a pond.

Pooling moonlight trickles through a skylight above, its feeble radiance catching on the edges of the high altar.  The tapered block of golvern is draped in snow-pure silk.  Interlocking circles and arcs of gold inlay cleave the marble floor, spreading from the altar like ripples across a pond.
